mapper.select: select mem.userid, userpw, username, birth, phone, enabled, auth from member mem left outer join mem_auth auth on mem.userid = auth.userid where mem.userid= #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, userpw, username, birth, phone) values(#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{birth}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where userid = #{userid}
